abstract: Brit rept German planes in Scapa Flow and convoy attack driven off; repts German patrol ships attacked with bombs; German version of combats
snippet: Reports from Berlin and London were at odds last night on a dusk air raid on Scapa Flow by German planes....

headline.main: NAZIS REPORT HITS IN SCAPA FLOW RAID; Say One Warship 'Listed' and One Belched Flame--British Deny Damage to Any Ship

lead_paragraph: Reports from Berlin and London were at odds last night on a dusk air raid on Scapa Flow by German planes.
